channel.title: Public void dialogue at bottom of screen

item.title: Public void dialogue at bottom of screen
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

how do i get the public void name {

to say something at bottom of screen.
i have this so far
public void startMessage() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126("", 4901);
sendFrame126(“Welcome”, 4902);
sendFrame126("", 4903);
sendFrame126(".", 4904);
sendFrame126("", 4905);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
sendFrame164(2492);
flushOutStream();
}

i dont know what any of the send frames mean. (well obviously send frames but i need to send it as a regular text and not options to choose from)

Read full topic
item.source: Public void dialogue at bottom of screen
